item.title: Leaves blocking drains in Wellington Gardens, 15th October
item.description:
At either end the leaf fall is not being collected and the drains are becoming blocked. It is so bad at the Church Lane end that you cannot tell where the pavement ends and the road begins. This is enough to cause someone to have an accident when trying to cross the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Gardens, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping all along Wellington Gardens, 15th October
item.description:
At Victoria Way end: mattress. By side wall of 111 Victoria Way (opp 76 Wellington Gardens): red painted wood. By Duderich Garages: blue bike. Outside 66-64: pile of rubbish. Outside 46: Home Sense/TK Max shopping trolley.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Gardens, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 15th October
item.description:

item.title: Public urination, 15th October
item.description:
Ref 8277165 I reported this issue last week. I have since received confirmation this issue has been resolved. Please may I have further details as to how this issue is resolved? If it’s just been cleaned, that’s not resolving the ongoing issue.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ashwin Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Fly tipping at disabled parking bay, 15th October
item.description:
More fly tipping on Sun Lane. The red bin has been full overflowing for months and people continue to add bags of dog waste etc. Now more random rubbish accumulating around it. Makes it impossible for a driver or passenger using disabled bay to get in or out of car kerbside.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Sun Lane, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus stop F - Countdown unit not working, 15th October
item.description:
Bus stop F - Countdown unit not working Outside -: “The Portland Hospital, 205-209 Great Portland St, London W1W 5AH” (Bus Stop F). Despite previous reports indicating the matter has been resolved, the problem remains unaddressed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Great Portland Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet
